com.github.daytron.daytronmoney.conversion

Class CurrencyExchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.daytron.daytronmoney.conversion.CurrencyExchange

  • public class CurrencyExchange
extends Object
    Class to handle all currency conversions. Can only request a single instance of this class.
    Author:
    Ryan Gilera

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Retrieves the one and only instance of this class.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static CurrencyExchange get()
        Retrieves the one and only instance of this class.
        Returns:
        CurrencyExchange object

      • convert

        public Money convert(Money fromMoney,
                     String toCurrencyCode)
              throws MoneyConversionException
        Converts a Money object to another currency.
        Parameters:
        fromMoney - Money object to be converted
        toCurrencyCode - String currency code to convert to
        Returns:
        Money object
        Throws:
        MoneyConversionException

      • convert

        public Money convert(Money fromMoney,
                     String toCurrencyCode,
                     LocalDateTime date)
              throws MoneyConversionException
        Convert a Money object to another currency on a specific point in time. Allowed historical currency conversion all the way back to year 2000. Some currency rates are not available on some dates, throws a MoneyConversionException if the rate or base is not available.
        Parameters:
        fromMoney - Money object to be converted
        toCurrencyCode - String currency code to convert to
        date - date at which point the rate is retrieved
        Returns:
        Money object
        Throws:
        MoneyConversionException - For any error encountered

      • getCurrencyRate

        public String getCurrencyRate(String baseCurrency,
                              String toCurrency)
        Get currency rate for a particular currency with a base currency. Returns null if MoneyConversionException occurred. Cause runtime exceptions if invalid arguments are presented.
        Parameters:
        baseCurrency - Base currency
        toCurrency - currency of the rate return
        Returns:
        Currency rate in String value
